comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: A Nancy O'Donoghue of Philadelphia married in 1917 Michael Francis Doyle. In view of the photo in Evening public ledger., January 21, 1918, Postscript Edition, Page 7, Column 2, it's most likely this person. About Michael Francis Doyle see humphrysfamilytree.com/Flanagan/misc.html, with a photo of Michael Francis Doyle and his wife Nancy, after audience with Pope Pius XII, Jan 1951.
